channel.title: How to change 508 rsps starter items
channel.description: i have a 508 server and want to change starter items if you could help please not changing ::starter ik how to do that please help :)

item.title: How to change 508 rsps starter items
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Ok, heres what I think

Ok, this will show you how to change the starter on a 508.

To change it, go to "src/palidino76/rs2/io/packets/commands.java
Then push CTRL+F and type in starter. then you should see this:

[code] if (cmd[0].equals(“starter”) && p.starter == 0) {

[/code]Once you have this there will be this under it:

This is saying that when you type in ::Starter, it will give you that item. The First “X” is the item number which is given, such as “995” for Coins.The Second “X” is for The amount of the item.

So say you want the starter to give you 10 Coins, you would put:

Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 10); So the entire Starter would be:

if (cmd[0].equals("starter") && p.starter == 0) {Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 10); Say you wanted to add another item, such as a whip.

All you need to do is put another code under the one above, like this:

This would give you both, the 10 coins, and a whip.

Hope it helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change 508 rsps starter items
